title: Help for Raised Ping.
body: I have had raised ping now for about 2-3 weeks. My ping is usually 38-48 and now it is at a consistant 70. I live in Manitoba (Canada), and I would like to know if anyone else is having this issue and if there are any ways around my issue. Thanks

replies.body: A consistent change in ping could be due to your ISP routing your network a long way to our servers.  To find out for sure, run a [traceroute ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)to get an overview of your routing.  [Submit a ticket](http://ticket) to our tech team who can look into this further, and attach the log to give some more context.  We'll respond as soon as possible!
